mapper.select: select pt.nodeid , pt.nodename, ct.trainstts , ct.Lat , ct.Lng, ct.major from publictpt_trainsttnlist pt inner join crawling_trainsttnlist ct on pt.nodename = ct.region;
mapper.insert: insert into publictpt_resultroute (adultcharge, arrplacename,depplacename,traingradename) select #{adultcharge},#{arrplacename},#{depplacename},#{traingradename} from dual where not exists (select * from publictpt_resultroute where adultcharge = #{adultcharge} and arrplacename = #{arrplacename} and depplacename = #{depplacename} and traingradename = #{traingradename});
